ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those brought near will witness it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Witnessed by those who are honoured.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: which the angels placed near Allah to safeguard.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The ones nearest to God will bring it to public.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Which is witnessed by the close ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To which bear witness those nearest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who are drawn near (to Allah) shall witness it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Attested by those who are brought near (unto their Lord).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: which those angels closest to God will bear witness to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: To which bear witness those brought nigh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To which bear witness those Nearest (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To which bear witness those nearest (to Allah, i.e. the angels).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: witnessed by those who are near (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:21] witnessed by those brought near, from among the angels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Attested by those who are brought near (unto their Lord)) the works of the righteous are attested by the dwellers of heaven who are near their Lord.
